oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies on cycloaddition of cyclohexa-2,4-dienones and transformation of adducts: A general, stereoselective route to multifunctional bicyclo [2.2.2] octanes and diquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
CHANDRA, G
MOBIN, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diels-alder reaction
enantioselective total-synthesis

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cycloaddition of in situ generated cyclohexa-2,4-dienones with vinyl ethers, vinyl acetate, and phenyl vinyl sulfone leading to variously functionalized bicyclo[2.2.2]octanes has been examined. Functional group manipulation in the resulting adducts gave bicyclo [2.2.2] octanes endowed with a beta,gamma-enone chromophore. Triplet-sensitized irradiation of bicyclooctenones followed by reductive cleavage provided a stereoselective route to diquinane frameworks having diverse functionalities.
